title: ModTweaker问题
author: hp涛涛
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Tollainmear 于 2020-3-22 18:39 编辑 

mods.thaumcraft.Infusion.addRecipe("ICHOR_PICK_GEM",<ThaumicTinkerer:ichorPick>,[<ForbiddenMagic:MorphPickaxe>,<Thaumcraft:ItemPickaxeElemental>,<ForbiddenMagic:StarBlock>,<ThaumicTinkerer:kamiResource:2>,<ThaumicTinkerer:kamiResource:2>,<ThaumicTinkerer:kamiResource>,<ThaumicTinkerer:kamiResource>,<ThaumicTinkerer:kamiResource:1>,<ThaumicTinkerer:kamiResource:1>,<Thaumcraft:FocusExcavation>,<Thaumcraft:FocusExcavation>],"Ignis 300,Perfodio 300,Terra 500,Metallum 900,Meto 120,Lucrum 500,Sensus 128",<ThaumicTinkerer:ichorPickGem>,15);
求助，这样加载成功了，但是注魔不了，神秘的nei扩展也是没改过的

已自行解决，文件后缀错误

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: 暗夜awa
replies.txt_content: 代码在写的过程中很容易出错，建议你删掉重新写，然后要注意ModTweaker要和MineTweaker同时加进服务器，不然是没办法编写的,然后编辑器建议你用Atom或者Notepad++进行编写
